courseDetails.title: Formation Orcaflex pour débutants/étudiants/Ingénieurs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Formation Orcaflex avec application à l'installation des gazoducs/oleoducs sous-marins
courseDetails.longDescription:
Cette formation a pour objectif d'apporter aux apprenants quelques connaissances de bases nécessaires pour correctement utiliser le logiciel Orcaflex. Ce logiciel est largement utilisé dans l'ingénierie offshore et sous-marine pour l'installation des structures en mer ou pour la simulation des systèmes d'ancrages entre autres (eoliennes en mer, pipelines, risers,...).

La formation OrcaFlex pour débutants est conçue pour offrir une introduction complète à l’utilisation du logiciel de modélisation et de simulation de systèmes offshore. Cette formation s’adresse aux ingénieurs, techniciens ou toute personne souhaitant acquérir les bases nécessaires pour modéliser des structures telles que des lignes d’ancrage, des risers, des câbles ou des pipelines sous-marins. Le programme débute par une présentation de l’interface d’OrcaFlex, la navigation dans les menus, et la création d’un nouveau projet. Les participants apprennent à définir les propriétés des éléments, à configurer les conditions environnementales (houle, vent, courant), et à paramétrer les scénarios de simulation. Des exercices pratiques permettent de manipuler les outils de visualisation, d’interpréter les résultats. L’accent est mis sur la compréhension des concepts fondamentaux, la gestion des erreurs courantes et l’optimisation des modèles pour obtenir des résultats fiables. À l’issue de la formation, les participants seront capables de réaliser des simulations simples, d’analyser les comportements dynamiques des structures offshore et de préparer des études de cas pour des projets réels. Cette formation constitue une base solide pour progresser vers des analyses plus avancées avec OrcaFlex.
targetAudiences: Ingénieurs en reconversion professionnelle et étudiants/stagiaires souhaitant travailler dans l’industrie des énergies marines (pétrolière, Gaz et éolienne marine).
Une entreprise souhaitant renforcer les connaissances de ses employés sur l’installation des structures offshore
Ingénieur mécanique débutants souhaitants travaillé dans le domaine maritime.

courseDetails.title: Financial Analysis & Analytics for Non-Finance Professionals
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master financial statements, budgets, forecasts, dashboards & analytics for smart decisions—no finance background needed
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a business owner, manager, entrepreneur, or professional with no formal finance background — but need to understand financial data to make smarter business decisions?

Do financial statements confuse you… yet you know mastering them could transform your business, career, or earning potential?

If yes, then this course is exactly what you’ve been looking for.

Financial Analysis & Analytics for Non-Finance Professionals is a practical, beginner-friendly course designed to help you build real financial confidence, even if you’ve never taken a finance class before.

Just clear explanations, simple visuals, and real-world examples you can immediately apply in your business or workplace.


What This Course Will Help You Achieve

By the end of this course, you will:

  • Understand the fundamentals of financial planning and analysis (FP&A)

  • Learn core finance concepts every professional MUST know

  • Interpret financial statements with clarity and confidence

  • Perform financial analysis using practical business examples

  • Apply financial analytics such as trend analysis, variance analysis, ratio analysis, and simple forecasting

  • Build and analyze budgets and forecasts for your business or job

  • Understand how revenue, expenses, assets, liabilities, and equity work in real life

  • Create basic financial models used in real-world planning

  • Apply cost analysis and break-even techniques to decision-making

  • Strengthen your financial intelligence and business acumen

  • Make better, data-driven business decisions using analytics

This course gives you both the traditional financial analysis skills AND the modern analytics mindset needed in today’s workplace.

Newly Added: Financial Analytics Module (Game-Changer!)

To match today’s business environment, this course now includes a powerful module on Financial Analytics, where you will learn:

  • How analytics helps you understand why numbers change

  • How to spot business trends using simple data visualizations

  • How to apply variance analytics to budgets and targets

  • How to analyze financial health with key ratios

  • How to create simple business forecasts for revenue and costs

  • How to use analytics to improve decision-making

This added content transforms your learning experience and gives you the tools to think like a modern financial professional.


Why This Course Matters

- Whether you run a small business…
- Lead a team…
- Manage a project…
- Work in operations, HR, marketing, logistics, supply chain, or tech…

Understanding financial data is the difference between guessing and making informed decisions that drive results.

Finance is not just for accountants and CFO's
It is the language of business, and anyone who wants to grow must speak it.


This course gives you the skills to:

  • Understand the story behind the numbers

  • See financial problems before they become crises

  • Make smarter, faster business decisions

  • Stand out at work with strong business acumen

  • Increase your confidence, credibility, and opportunities


If you've ever said, “I wish someone explained finance simply,” — your wish has come true.


What You’ll Learn (Step-by-Step)

Across the video lessons, you will learn how to:

Finance & Accounting Basics

  • Understand revenue, expenses, assets, liabilities, and equity

  • Learn key financial terminology and what each term means in business

Financial Statements Mastery

  • Analyze the Income Statement for profitability

  • Interpret the Balance Sheet for financial health

  • Understand the Cash Flow Statement and why cash is king

  • See how the three statements connect

Financial Analysis Techniques

  • Evaluate performance using ratios

  • Assess profitability, liquidity, and efficiency

  • Learn break-even analysis and basic costing

  • Understand how numbers drive decisions

Financial Analytics Essentials

  • Trend analytics: understand business patterns

  • Variance analytics: compare actual vs budget

  • Ratio analytics: measure financial strength

  • Forecasting analytics: predict future performance

  • Build a data-driven mindset

Planning, Budgeting & Forecasting

  • Create simple budgets

  • Understand forecasting logic

  • Use cost analysis for strategic decisions

  • Build basic financial models


Your Transformation by the End of This Course

By the time you finish, you will be able to:

  • Read financial data…

  • Analyze business performance…

  • Spot trends…

  • Build simple forecasts…

  • Make confident, well-informed decisions…

  • And communicate financial insights like a professional —

    without needing a finance degree.

You will walk away empowered, confident, and ready to take control of your business or career.


Now is the Time — Level Up Your Financial Intelligence

Financial literacy is not optional anymore.
The people who rise in business are the ones who understand financial analysis and analytics.


If you want to:

  • grow your business

  • increase your earning power

  • impress employers

  • become more valuable at work

  • make smarter decisions

  • stop guessing and start knowing

then enroll now and take the first step toward mastering the language of business.

Click Enroll Now and begin your financial transformation today.
targetAudiences: Business Owners & Entrepreneurs  Who want to confidently read financial statements, analyze performance, forecast growth, and use financial analytics to avoid costly mistakes.
Managers & Team Leaders  Who are responsible for budgets, reporting, or strategic decisions and need practical financial analysis and planning skills to lead effectively.

Professionals Transitioning Into Finance  If you’re moving into roles like financial analyst, business analyst, FP&A analyst, cost analyst, or operations analyst, this course gives you a strong foundation.
Freelancers, Consultants & Virtual Assistants  Who want to offer premium services such as financial reporting, budgeting support, or performance analytics to clients.
Start-Up Founders  Who need clear financial insight to manage cash flow, prepare forecasts, and communicate with investors or lenders.
Non-Finance Professionals in Any Industry  Including supply chain, sales, HR, marketing, logistics, operations, and project management — anyone who must understand numbers to make decisions.
Students & Job Seekers  Who want to strengthen their CV, gain practical financial skills, and stand out when applying for finance-related or business roles.
